question: My son is 15 and tells me that he has to urinate during school frequently, and it annoys his teachers.  He also suffers from stomach aches on a weekly basis, and has 3-5 bowel movements each day.  He is very thin.  Though he eats fruit, veggies, and whole grains, and drinks lots of milk (no soda), how do I determine if he has a stomach ailment, high metabolism or diabetes?He loves candy and would eat it every day if allowed.KES3cats
title: 15 year old son with frequent stomach aches and urination
